attributes.action: immediately condemn the Iranian authorities for the death of Neda Agha-Soltan and other protesters, and back any UN resolution on sanctions against the Iranian authorities for its actions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There has been world-wide condemnation of the use of deadly force being employed by the Iranian authorities to quell civil unrest following the disputed election.

The death of Neda Salehi Agha Soltan has appalled the civilised world, and demonstrates the need for strong international condemnation.

We urge our Prime Minister to send a strong message to the Iranian government, condemning its actions and to call a halt to suppression of demonstrations.

We also urge the PM to back any forthcoming UN resolution to take sanctions against the Iranian regime.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
